text: Petru Bogatu (12 July 1951 – 22 March 2020) was a Moldovan journalist, essayist, political analyst and writer. He was an editor at the National Newspaper. He was a professor at the State University of Moldova, Faculty of Journalism and Communication Sciences.PETRU BOGATU. Omul care ne face ordine în debaraua din cap He died on 22 March 2020 of cancer, aged 68. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Editors Category:Journalists Category:Essayists Category:Political writers Category:Academics Category:Moldovan writers
title: Petru Bogatu
